title: Mum not talking 2 aunt I send regards through someone Am I sinful 4 delay 2 keep ties assim alhakeem
transcript: I'm from Canada she says she wants to connect to her aunt through a third party would she be sinful if for the delay for a week for five days for no there's no time limit as long as you you've done your due diligence and you tried your best and you know that this is the only way to reconcile between your mom's anger and connecting to your aunt this is permissible inshallah but at the same time you have to do your level best to connect to your relatives even if your mom is angered by that there's no obedience for any creature in disobeying Allah Allah is the one who ordered you to connect to your aunt and to your next kin
